===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しゅら}}: also see [[Asura]]

# [[Buddhist]] [[term]], literally meaning: "''cultivated gauze''", referring to one of the six realms of [[reincarnation]] in Buddhist [[cosmology]].
# an Indian [[ogreish]] god. see {{l|ja|阿修羅}}
# [[carnage]]
# a [[cart]] that carrying rocks or woods. {{l|ja|修羅車}}.
